rewrites a simple component from one to the other and adds a html
comment for debugging purposes
---
{"debug":true}
---
<vue-component-doc>Hallo</vue-component-doc>
---
<vue-component-doc-prism language="html">
  <template v-slot:code>Hallo</template>
  <template v-slot:result>Hallo</template>
</vue-component-doc-prism>
<!-- Rewriter result:
<vue-component-doc-prism language="html">
  <template v-slot:code>Hallo</template>
  <template v-slot:result>Hallo</template>
</vue-component-doc-prism>
-->
